message: Abbreviation in name 'stopOrDisablePGElements' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'rootPGId' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'startPGCommands' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'VALUES' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Local variable name 'VALUES' must match pattern '^[a-z]([a-z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9]*)?$'.
Abbreviation in name 'rootPGId' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'getRootPGId' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
Abbreviation in name 'rootPGId' must contain no more than '2' consecutive capital letters.
